${ModID}:BoosterPack.NAME: Booster Pack
${ModID}:BoosterPack.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random ${ModID}:different color cards to your hand. NL Give them Ethereal.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The cards generated by this card are weighted towards being lower rarity.

${ModID}:StardustShield.NAME: Stardust Shield
${ModID}:StardustShield.DESCRIPTION: Skill ${ModID}:Enchantment. NL 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。

${ModID}:StarShower.NAME: Star Shower
${ModID}:StarShower.DESCRIPTION: Attack ${ModID}:Enchantment. NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。

${ModID}:PortalPunch.NAME: Portal Punch
${ModID}:PortalPunch.DESCRIPTION: {@@}造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Add {!M!|@=a|>1=!M!} random ${ModID}:different color {!M!|@=card|>1=cards} to your hand. Give {!M!|@=it|>1=them} Ethereal.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The cards generated by this card are weighted towards being lower rarity.

${ModID}:BackupRift.NAME: Enchanted Rift
${ModID}:BackupRift.DESCRIPTION: {@@}获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Draw {!M!|@=an|>1=!M!} ${ModID}:Enchantment {!M!|@=card|>1=cards}.

${ModID}:StarLane.NAME: Fetch!
${ModID}:StarLane.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Skill ${ModID}:Enchantment. NL 抽一张牌. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:NeutronStar.NAME: Neutron Star
${ModID}:NeutronStar.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Attack ${ModID}:Enchantment. NL Gain !M! Strength NL this turn. NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:NeutronStar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Attack ${ModID}:Enchantment. NL Gain !M! Strength NL this turn.

${ModID}:FastHands.NAME: Fast Hands
${ModID}:FastHands.DESCRIPTION: After playing a ${ModID}:different color card, 抽一张牌.
${ModID}:FastHands.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: After playing a ${ModID}:different color card, 抽一张牌 and reduce its cost by 1 this turn.

${ModID}:DimensionBreach.NAME: Dimension Breach
${ModID}:DimensionBreach.DESCRIPTION: Play !M! random ${ModID}:different color attacks on the enemy.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The cards generated by this card are weighted towards being lower rarity.

${ModID}:Horizonbound.NAME: Horizonbound
${ModID}:Horizonbound.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL ${ModID}:Different color cards cost 1 less for each other ${ModID}:different color card played this turn.
${ModID}:Horizonbound.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Different color cards cost 1 less for each other ${ModID}:different color card played this turn.
